Location: Tan Quy Ward, District 7, Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

about.title: About Me
about.content: I am a Front-end Developer with nearly 2 years of experience, specializing in building web applications using ReactJS and popular UI libraries such as Ant Design and Material UI. I have strong skills in creating user-friendly, high-performance, and responsive interfaces across various devices. In addition, I possess basic knowledge of backend development and APIs, as well as experience working in teams and using Git. My goal is to continuously improve my programming skills and contribute to high-quality product development projects.

current.title: Front-end Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained multiple web applications using React
Collaborated with the design team to implement responsive user interfaces
Contributed to projects using Next.js and Vue.js frameworks
Worked with low-code platforms such as Jet Admin and Appsmith to build internal tools and dashboards
Optimized user experience and ensured cross-browser and cross-device compatibility
current.summary: My professional journey and work experience in the tech industry.

projects.title: My Projects
projects.warehouse: Warehouse management application for VietMap's warranty system, helping to track inventory, returns, and warranty replacements.
projects.salePlan: The application supports VietMap's sales team in planning sales by quarter and year.
projects.callInsight: The application analyzes calls, helping the customer service department assess employee skills and performance.
projects.appSmith: The admin application for VietMap's sales system, enabling dealers to purchase products directly through the VietMap platform.
projects.jetadmin: An internal application system, including payment management, SIM management, and Logitech device management...
